question: How to play a minigame?
answer: Use `/play <name of minigame>` (Ex. `/play hangman`) to start the game. Then use either buttons or slash commands starting with the name of the minigame to interact with it. (Ex. `/hangman guess`)

question: How to see my stats?
answer: You can use `/profile` to see your balance. You can use `/stats` to view your stats. To compare your ranks to others use `/leaderboard`.

question: What are the rewards for completing a minigame?
answer: You some coins after playing a minigame. The reward is higher if you won the minigame. You also have a chance of receiving a crate if you won.

question: How to get more coins?
answer: Claim kits (`/cooldowns`), complete quests `/quests` use boosters if you play multiple minigames. (`/boosters`)

question: How to increase time which marks minigame or party as inactive?
answer: Currently there are none, but the ways are planned.

question: How to play minigames with my friends?
answer: Create a party with `/party create`. Your friends (or other people) can join it with `/party join`.

question: How to prevent random people from joining my party?
answer: You can make the party private with `/party private`. Invite people to a private party with `/party invite`. If you no longer want your party to be private, use `/party public`.

question: How to prevent random people from joining my party?
answer: You can make the party private with `/party private`. Invite people to a private party with `/party invite`. If you no longer want your party to be private, use `/party public`.

question: How to leave my party?
answer: You can leave a party with `/party leave`. If you are the owner of the party, you can't leave the party. Instead, you need to either transfer the party ownership to someone else with `/party transfer` or delete the party with `/party delete`.

question: How to remove someone from my party?
answer: You can use `/party kick` to remove a user from your party. If you are not the owner of the party, you need to ask the owner to kick the user.

question: How to see the members of my party?
answer: Use `/party members` to see list of the members on your party.

question: How do I play minigames on my own server?
answer: Invite the bot to your server with `/invite`..

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Create a new issue on the [GitHub page](https://github.com/adex720/Minigames/issues). Make sure the bug is not already reported before creating the issue. Be as detailed as possible.

question: How can I suggest a new feature?
answer: Create a new issue on the [GitHub page](https://github.com/adex720/Minigames/issues). Make sure the feature isn't already suggested before creating the issue. Give much detail about the feature and why it should be added.

question: Where can I ask questions about the bot?
answer: Use the #help channel on the support server to ask questions. You can find answers to frequently asked questions on the #faq channel.

question: How can I join the support server?
